name: Ai Screenshot Bot
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram. Powered by @TM_Adminz

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

PORT.description: (defaults to 8080) - The port to listen at

HOST.description: (defaults to localhost) - The host to listen at

TRUST_FORWARD_HEADERS.description: (defaults to false) - Whether or not to trust X-Forwarded-For headers when logging requests

DEBUG.description: (defaults to false) - Whether or not to enable extra prints

REQUEST_LIMIT.description: (default 5) - The maximum number of requests a single IP can have active at a time

CONNECTION_LIMIT.description: (default 20) - The maximum number of connections to a single Telegram datacenter

TG_START_MESG.description: The message that should be shown in Telegram chat, in case of non-media message

TG_G_C_MESG.description: The message that should be shown in a Telegram Group chat

TG_SESSION_NAME.description: (defaults to tgfilestream) - The name of the Telethon session file to use

TG_BOT_FATHER_TOKEN.description: (defaults to None) - This option is mutually exclusive to TG_SESSION_NAME, and if set, the client will login as a bot, instead of an user
